title: fvSlider

prop.name: showTabs
prop.description: Show tab buttons on top of slider.

prop.name: showNavs
prop.description: Show navigation buttons on bottom of slider.

prop.name: showButtons
prop.description: Show next/prev buttons on next to slider.

prop.name: interval
prop.description: Miliseconds time to automatic change the value key. If it's 0, it does not apply.

event.name: input
event.description: Fired when component request to change value.

scopedSlot.name: slide-${slide}
scopedSlot.description: Your slides puted here by unique slot name.

scopedSlot.name: tab
scopedSlot.description: Field tab buttons template. slide param equal to slot (slide) names.

note: fvSlider consider slots with slide- name starts as slide and text after that is slide name
If value prop is undefined at start, fvSlider will fire input event with first slide value.
If you want to get your custom object for button slot, you can use value as key and handle target object outside of fvSlider.
